comment.author: 39914882@N08
comment._content: Wait, where is this? I am trying to get information on where the condo is at 2501 E Franklin? I know the building has to be older than 1958. Was this across the street, where the new town homes were built? I just know that the Chuch Hill Gables and the Box Factory are older too.

comment.author: 62668910@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/windowdepotusa] 2501 E Franklin St is on the southeast corner. The old warehouse portion of the condos there was built in 1910. The corner of the building in the foreground is Church Hill Gables, the entrance that is visible is the one that has been bricked up non the current building. There is another photo in this stream that shows an aerial view from Broad at the church looking south. You can see this empty lot across from 2501 and the Pohlig box factory, whose dormer windows should help you spot it in the top left of the frame.
